learn_more_subtitle: Discover the powerful features that make Wanz Req the ultimate platform for anonymous messaging.
learn_more_feature_1_desc: All messages are sent completely anonymously. Your identity is always protected.
learn_more_feature_2_desc: Upgrade to Premium to reveal the IP address, country, and device type of every message you receive.
learn_more_feature_3_desc: Use Wanz Req on your phone, tablet, or desktop. Our responsive design ensures a seamless experience.
learn_more_feature_4_desc: Get instant push notifications on your device as soon as a new message arrives. Never miss a thing!
learn_more_feature_5_desc: We prioritize your privacy. Your data is stored securely and we never share it with third parties.
learn_more_feature_6_desc: Use the app in your preferred language. We support multiple languages from around the world.
meta_description_home: Wanz Req - Get anonymous messages and feedback from your friends, followers, and colleagues.
meta_description_learn_more: Learn more about the features of Wanz Req, including anonymous messaging, IP tracking, and instant notifications.
